pipian 0.3.0

  • Changelog

An alternative of RMeCabFreq

Source: R/compat-rmecab.R
gbs_freq.Rd

An alternative of RMeCabFreq

gbs_freq(df, ..., .name_repair = TRUE)

Arguments

df

A prettified data.frame of tokenized sentences.
...

Other arguments are passed to dplyr::tally().
.name_repair

Logical: If true, then rename the column names as RMecabFreq-compatible style.

Value

A data.frame.

See also

Other gibasa: gbs_as_tokens(), gbs_collocate(), gbs_c(), gbs_dfm()

Examples

xml <- ppn_parse_xml(system.file("sample.xml", package = "pipian"))
head(gbs_freq(xml))

#> # A tibble: 6 x 4
#>   Term   Info1 Info2   Freq
#>   <chr>  <chr> <chr>  <int>
#> 1 <U+3001>     <U+8A18><U+53F7>  <U+8AAD><U+70B9>       6
#> 2 <U+3044>     <U+52D5><U+8A5E>  <U+81EA><U+7ACB>       1
#> 3 <U+3044><U+308B>   <U+52D5><U+8A5E>  <U+81EA><U+7ACB>       1
#> 4 <U+3044><U+308C><U+308B> <U+52D5><U+8A5E>  <U+81EA><U+7ACB>       1
#> 5 <U+304C>     <U+52A9><U+8A5E>  <U+683C><U+52A9><U+8A5E>     3
#> 6 <U+3053><U+3068>   <U+540D><U+8A5E>  <U+975E><U+81EA><U+7ACB>     2
